item.title: Instagram is finally launching an iPad app
item.description: Instagram is finally launching an iPad app after years of users asking the company to make one.

item.title: Venezuela’s president thinks American spies can’t hack Huawei phones
item.description: Huawei phones, given their custom hardware and operating system, may actually be easier to hack than other brands.

item.title: How to watch Apple announce the iPhone 17
item.description: Apple is debuting the iPhone 17 at its annual hardware event on September 9.
